Design and Web

Embark - Global Work & Travel Initiative

Background:

Embark was founded in 2016 and as a startup they requested web development to market their product offering of global work and travel experiences. Embarktogether.io needed to articulate not only their experience offering but each trips itinerary to create interest and engagement with their audience to register.

Website

Embark was a newly founded start up with their overall brand style and guidelines still being established and needed their website launched within a reletavily tight timeline to support their proof-of-concept business development and marketing launch.

To support their initiative worked with them to provide an introduction to brands overarching style through the graphic design development to visually represent their business offering and the inaugural 'South America Experience' trip. In addition, provided corporate tag lines, content, website design and development.

Services provided for project:


Web Design

Provided their website 'skin' design and graphic designs to visually represent and support their brand, product offering and inaugural 'South America Experience' trip.


Graphic Production

Finalized all design elements required and produced optimized web-ready assets required for the web development process within Squarespace.


Web Development

As a startup with limited budget they utilize Squarespace. Implement their site structure, customized CSS, content and graphics and built their website presence.
